content.rendered: The vast array of our appetizing pork loins and capicolas can delightfully surprise the tastebuds. Not to mention our headcheese made only with the best selected whole pieces of pork meat. Our smoking, cooking and roasting techniques give each product a different dimension of taste, so hop on the palate-pleasing adventure with us and discover the products below.
